700870f-a.text:
East Burnside Ave., east from Creston Ave., to and including Grand
Concourse.
November 12, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
700870f-a.folder: Burnside Avenue (Eas & Creston Avenue, Bronx, NY

700813f-a.text:
Creston Ave., at the south side of East Burnside Ave. IIn the foreground, at the S.E. corner of the two thoroughfares appears a small public place under construction by the W.P.A. The two buildings, at the S.W. corner bear Nos. 2043 and 2O39 (right to left).
November 12, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
700813f-a.folder: Creston Avenue & Burnside Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
